DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Efficacy Safety Intracoronary Stenting With Without Abciximab , Anti-Platelet Therapy , Conventional Coronary Angioplasty With Abciximab
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety effectiveness intracoronary stenting without abciximab , anti-platelet therapy , conventional coronary angioplasty abciximab patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention . Patients randomly assign one three treatment group : coronary angioplasty plus abciximab , intracoronary stent plus abciximab , intracoronary stent plus placebo . The primary measure effectiveness 30-day composite , clinical outcome determine number death , myocardial infarction , urgent repeat revascularizations . Please see attached result . Patients receive one three different treatment : Coronary angioplasty plus abciximab ; Intracoronary stent plus abciximab ; Intracoronary stent plus placebo .
